bug.author: amygeorge
bug.description: Describe the bug In the file /nlp-architect/solutions/absa_solution/sentiment_solution.py line number 42 which is: from .utils import Anonymiser, _ui_format should be written as from utils import Anonymiser, _ui_format without the period in front of utils.

comments.comment: Hi, I just pulled from master and the issue is still there.
